DLG SPR_0
You check your mailbox. There are no new messages.

DLG SPR_1
A news anchor is in the middle of a report, "..the fire continues to rage on Routes 1, 2, and 3." In the background, a team of Hygrons use water attacks against a wall of fire on a city road, "Our sister station in Ankor City was evacuated earlier today."
